headline: Comcast names cable spin-off Versant in brand overhaul
summary: Comcast (CMCSA) unveiled the official name of its upcoming cable spin-off: Versant. Yahoo Finance senior media reporter Allie Canal joins Market Domination host Josh Lipton to break down the channels that the new cable operator will include and what Comcast is keeping. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Today’s Home of the Flyers and 76ers to Have New Name: Xfinity Mobile Arena
summary: PHILADELPHIA, May 06, 2025--Comcast Spectacor and Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment (HBSE) today announced the world-class sports and entertainment venue in South Philadelphia – the current home of the National Hockey League’s Philadelphia Flyers, National Basketball Association’s Philadelphia 76ers, college basketball, premier global concerts, and entertainment events – will be renamed Xfinity Mobile Arena, effective September 1, 2025, through the 2030-2031 season.

raw.headline: Today’s Home of the Flyers and 76ers to Have New Name: Xfinity Mobile Arena

headline: Morgan Stanley says tariff on movies could reduce companies’ earnings power
summary: Morgan Stanley notes that last night, President Trump posted on social media an announcement of 100% tariffs on all movies coming into the U.S. produced in “Foreign Lands.” In the bear case, this likely reduces the earnings power of all companies in the value chain, the firm says, adding that 100% tariffs on some or all of the cost of a film would lead to fewer films, more expensive films, and lower earnings for all in the business. headline: Tariffs on films may end up hurting industry, says Barclays
summary: Some names in the media sector, like Netflix (NFLX), had been seen as defensive due to lack of exposure to tariff-related threats, but headlines about 100% tariffs on foreign-made films are “likely to result in this hypothesis being questioned,” according to Barclay analyst Kannan Venkateshwar. However, there are “literally no details available at this point other than a social media post from President Trump,” so it is not clear how this will be implemented, the analyst noted. If this is deploy

headline: Comcast Business Recognized as #1 Provider for Managed SD-WAN by Vertical Systems Group for the First Time
summary: PHILADELPHIA, May 06, 2025--Comcast Business today announced it is the number one ranked U.S. provider of Managed SD-WAN services for the first time, surpassing AT&T, according to Vertical Systems Group’s 2024 U.S. Carrier Managed SD-WAN Services Leaderboard. Additionally, Comcast Business has been recognized as the fastest-growing provider in this segment, climbing from eighth place in 2018 to its current leadership position, based on the number of installed customer sites. headline: Disney Stock Is Struggling. Why Theme-Park Earnings Will Be Key for Any Rebound.
summary: The House of Mouse's shares have slumped 17% in 2025, dragged down by the worry that tariffs will chip away at consumer spending.
